faq.question: How many documents can I save?
faq.answer: Free plan allows 50 documents. Starter gets 500, Pro gets unlimited. All plans include unlimited storage for summaries and chat history.

faq.question: Are my documents private and secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Your library is private by default. We use enterprise-grade encryption and never share your data. You can share specific documents if you choose.

faq.question: Can I organize documents into folders?
faq.answer: Yes! Create unlimited folders and sub-folders. Drag and drop documents to organize them however you like.

faq.question: How does semantic search work?
faq.answer: Instead of matching exact keywords, semantic search understands meaning. Search for 'machine learning studies' and find documents about AI research, neural networks, etc.

faq.question: Can I access my library from multiple devices?
faq.answer: Yes! Your library syncs across all devices in real-time. Access from web, desktop, or mobile.

faq.question: What happens to my original PDFs?
faq.answer: Original PDFs are stored securely along with summaries. Download originals anytime or re-process with different summary types.
